job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgthuman capital is a venture firm for engineersampnbspwe believe great engineers build great companies and we invest in founders and startups that share that mindsetampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtin the last years that mantra has led us to invest in companies before they became unicorns including snowflake anduril livongo and brex where we wrote the first check we have over m aum and weve built a network of over incredible driven ambitious engineersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtnow were looking for fullstack engineers to help us build our next chapterltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtthe roleltstronggtltpgtltpgtyoull join a team of and partner across the company to build products and systems to maximize impact for our community engineers portfolio companies and investors youll report to our head of engineering and have a tangible impact on our culture and business if youre passionate about people entrepreneurship venture and tech wed love to talkltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtyour pastltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtideally years of industry experienceltligtltligtexperience building and scaling web apps to broad audiencesltligtltligtknowledge of databases apis and foundation in data scienceltligtltligtcomfortable with cloud technologies and continuous deploymentltligtltligtfull stack mentality comfortable with frontend or backendltligtltligtparticipated in projects with technical and nontechnical stakeholdersltligtltligtenjoy a fastpaced startup environmentltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtyour mindsetltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtyou thrive in ambiguity and can get going without a specltligtltligtyou enjoy working directly with end usersltligtltligtyoure scrappy and have an entrepreneurial mindsetltligtltligtyoure datadriven in your decision makingltligtltligtyoure eager to make products that can impact the trajectory of early startupsltligtltligtyou love learning about venture capital finance and emerging tech companiesltligtltulgt
